did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Additional Papers of Alan Cheuse
1985-1994
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 1,060 items (6 Hollinger boxes, ca. 2.5 linear shelf feet).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
Univeristy of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Additional Papers of Alan Cheuse, Accession #10726-l,-m, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Alan Cheuse of Fairfax, Virginia, placed his papers on loan to the Library on September 17, 1993, and on May 3, 1994. The papers were purchased by the Library on September 11, 2003.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These additions to the papers of Alan Cheuse, American novelist and reviewer, ca. 1,060 items (6 Hollinger boxes, ca. 2.5 linear shelf feet), ca. 1985-1994, consist of his personal and professional correspondence, book reviews by or about Cheuse, appointment calendars, printed material, manuscripts of short stories and articles by Cheuse and other writers, a promotional poster from Grove Press, cassette tape recordings of talks and readings by Cheuse, The Sound of Writingtypescripts and production schedules for National Public Radio, and interviews with Cheuse, one a videocassette recording interview with WMU - TV in Marquette, Michigan.

Correspondents and topics in the general correspondence (Boxes 4-6) include: Lee Abbott, (1992 Nov 16; 1993 Feb 6); Joyce Adler, (1992 Apr 19); John W. Aldridge, (1993 Nov 2, 8, 22); Barbara Ascher (1992 Sep 30; 1993 Apr 19); Anselm Atkins, (1992 Nov 7); Lynne Barrett, (1994 Mar 20); Richard Bass, (1992 May 6, Jun 18; 1993 Dec 5); Rex Batson, (1992 May 13); Steve Becker, (1992 Jul 13, Nov 7); Elizabeth Benedict, (1993 Jan 21); Sara Bettencourt, (1992 Jun 26); Staige D. Blackford, (1993 May 7; 1994 Apr 13); James D. Bloom, (1992 Jul 1, 22, Dec 3; 1993 Oct 27, Nov 11, Dec 27); Linda Burgess, (1993 Jun 7); Steve Chapman, (1992 Aug 6); Duncan Christy, (1992 Mar 23, Jun 24; 1993 Apr 27); Daisy Chun-Rhodes, (1993 Apr 2); Edward M. Cifelli, (1990 Jun 20); Evan Connell, (1993 Oct 13); Lee Cullum, (1992 Jun 11, Sep 22); Deborah Cummins, (1992 Aug 19; Oct 5); Richard Currey, (1992 Nov 21; 1993 Jan 19); C. Michael Curtis, (1993 Mar 17); Dalkey Archive Press (1989 Feb 10, with Cheuse comments re book reviewing); Liz Darhansoff, (1993 Feb 1); Davenport Productions (1989 Mar 20); Nicholas Delbanco, (1992 Jul 30, Sep 27, Oct 31, Dec 4, 30; 1993 Jan 15, Apr 1, May 11, 29, Jul 12, Oct 4, 10; 1994 Apr 23); Janice F. Delaney, (1993 May 20; 1994 May 25); E.L. Scott Fitzgerald, critical essays re (1990 Dec 7; 1993 Sep 20); Lynn Freed, (1993 Jan 19, Feb 10); Laura Furman, (1992 Aug 17; 1993 Jul 12); George Garrett, (1992 May 15); Reginald Gibbons, (1992 May 14); M. Michael Kasum, (1993 May 14); Mary E Kollar,. (1992 May 19, Jul 18, Oct 3, Dec 21); James Howard Kunstler, (1993 Mar 2, 30); Vachel Lindsay, death of (1994 Feb 1); Mary Lockwood, (1992 Oct 22, Dec 7); Barry Lopez, (1993 Aug 9, Sep 17; 1994 May 15); Bret Lott, (1992 Oct 15; 1994 Jan 4); Dianne Luce, (1992 Feb 13); Daryl McGrath, (1992 Jul 22, Sep 21; 1993 Jan 20, Jul 19, Aug 10; 1994 Feb 20); Victoria McKernan, (1992 Jul 8); John MacLean, (1992 May 12); Terry McMillan, (1993 Jan 4); Maureen McSherry, (1993 Aug 31); David Madden, (1992 Sep 26, Nov 7); Norman Mailer, (1993 Jul 7); Malamud Committee (1993 Apr 23); Mary Malone, (1993 Aug 12); Manly, Inc.
